cause.description:
Fireworks produce smoke and dust that contain heavy metals, sulfur-coal compounds and some low concentration toxic chemicals. These by-products of fireworks combustion will vary depending on the mix of ingredients of a particular firework.
1. Minimize using fireworks on random occasions.
2. Use less toxic materials in fireworks.
3. Afterall, the world can survive without fireworks!
cause.mission: To enhance awareness about the side effects of fireworks.
cause.name: Against Fireworks - the "Pretty" Pollution
